title: veDalenu kOdhaNDapaaNi
sahitya:
veDalenu kOdaNDapANi anuja saumitrini gUDi

anupallavi

 puDamilO janulella bogaDa pUjituDau mauni veNTa

caraNam

 shiramuna koNDeyu jAra uramuna hAramulu meraya karamuna 
shara cApamulu velaya surucira vAdyamulu mrOya surusellaru 
vinuti sEyavara tyAgarAja nutuDu vasudha bhAramellanu dIrpa
